items.item_details: Attached is the November 27-30 2006, ESUHSD Citizens Advisory Committee Meeting Agenda (PDF).
items.item_text: Information explaining Committee meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Committee will be provided and/or read.
items.item_text_raw: 1.01 Information explaining Committee meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Committee will be provided and/or read.

meeting_sections.section_name: WELCOME AND EXPLANATION TO COMMITTEE MEMBERS AND AUDIENCE

items.item_text: Interview of Candidates for Pending Board Vacancy: Shall take place on November 27, 28, 29 and 30, 2006, beginning at 6:00 p.m. each day
items.item_text_raw: 2.01 Interview of Candidates for Pending Board Vacancy: Shall take place on November 27, 28, 29 and 30, 2006, beginning at 6:00 p.m. each day

meeting_sections.section_name: INTERVIEW OF CANDIDATES FOR PENDING BOARD VACANCY

items.item_text: Public Comments: To take place on November 30, 2006, beginning at 8:45 p.m.
items.item_text_raw: 3.01 Public Comments: To take place on November 30, 2006, beginning at 8:45 p.m.

items.item_text: Committee selection of Semi-Finalists for Appointment to Pending Board Vacancy: To take place at November 30, 2006, meeting.
items.item_text_raw: 4.01 Committee selection of Semi-Finalists for Appointment to Pending Board Vacancy: To take place at November 30, 2006, meeting.

meeting_sections.section_name: COMMITTEE SELECTION OF SEMI-FINALISTS FOR APPOINTMENT TO PENDING BOARD VACANCY
